item.title: Aerin add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "Anyone can slay a dragon ...but try waking up every morning and loving the world all over again. That's what takes a real hero." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Aerin add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Aerin add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "I used to believe my father about everything but then I had children myself & now I see how much stuff you make up just to keep yourself from going crazy." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Aerin add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "You see things; you say, 'Why?' But I dream things that never were; and I say 'Why not?" -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Aerin add a quote by Philip Pullman
item.description: "I think it's perfectly possible to explain how the universe came about without bringing God into it, but I don't know everything, and there may well be a God somewhere, hiding away. Actually, if he is keeping out of sight, it's because he's ashamed of his followers and all the cruelty and ignorance they're responsible for promoting in his name. If I were him, I'd want nothing to do with them." -- Philip Pullman

item.title: Aerin add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "I have a renewed commitment to elegance, she said, in case you think I'm just spending money for the fun of it. " -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Aerin add a quote by Henry Ford
item.description: "My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me." -- Henry Ford

item.title: Aerin add a quote by Michel de Montaigne
item.description: "The greatest thing in the world is to know how to belong to oneself." -- Michel de Montaigne

item.title: Aerin add a quote by Lev Grossman
item.description: "Though the funny thing about never being asked for anything is that after a while you start to feel like maybe you don’t have anything worth giving." -- Lev Grossman

item.title: Aerin add a quote by M.T. Anderson
item.description:
"People talk about the beauty of the spring, but I can't see it. The trees are brown and bare, slimy with rain. Some are crawling with new purple hairs. And the buds are bulging like tumorous acne, and I can tell that something wet, and soft, and cold, and misshapen is about to be born.
And I am turning into a vampire." -- M.T. Anderson

item.title: Aerin add a quote by Wil Wheaton
item.description:
"Things every person should have:
•A nemesis. •An evil twin. •A secret headquarters. •An escape hatch. •A partner in crime. •A secret identity." -- Wil Wheaton
